attributes.action: People who earn over 55,000 per year should pay extra tax not people on low wage
attributes.additional_details: As there are many other key workers that have been working through this pandemic, never get the chance to speak up.
attributes.background: People who make 55,000 per year should pay more tax and other below this shouldn't.

rejection.details:
You might like to sign the following petition:

Exempt essential works from any income tax increase
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/554256
